name: Diatomic (itch)
description:
*Display FULLSCREEN*

*For better experience, play executable*

--------------

A lot of waves of diatomic molecules are coming but one of them its a dangerous unstable atom.

Shoot another unstable atom to it to force them merge into a stable diatomic molecule and save the wave.

If you fail the shoot or you are too slow, all the waves will be unstable and you will lose the game.

Good luck!
  • Menu controls:
    • Arrow keys to select
    • Spacebar to accept
  • Game controls:
    • Arrow keys to aim
    • Spacebar to shoot
Created for Spain Game Devs Jam III

All game design and programming by SensistarX

Thanks for playing.
